settings.title: Are you ready?
settings.description: Engage and inspire your students with Author visits for grades PK-8!

settings.title: Author Visits & Readings
settings.description:
As an author dedicated to promoting literacy and body safety education. I offer a range of programs that can be tailored to meet your specific needs.
My goal is to collaborate with you to align my books and presentations with your objectives and to complement the topics you are already teaching your students from PK - 8th grade.

My books cover a range of important themes such as confidence, manners, facing fears, overcoming obstacles, problem-solving, consent, and body safety. Almost all of my books are written in rhyme, making them engaging and useful for children learning to read.
I aim to make your experience with me a positive one, and seek to leave everyone feeling good about my visit to your school. In addition to school visits, I also offer readings of my books for preschools.

If you're interested in more information or booking a school visit, library visit, or speaking engagement, please don't hesitate to reach out via my contact form.

settings.title: Visit Types
settings.content: As a children's book author, I offer various types of school visits to meet the unique needs of different schools and grade levels. My author visits have been shown to have a profound impact on students, improving literacy, encouraging reading for pleasure, inspiring reluctant readers, enthusing pupils in their own writing, giving confidence, broadening knowledge of literature, allowing pupils to meet a favorite author, and providing an opportunity for children to ask questions. Additionally, author visits have a positive impact on teachers who can gain professionally and personally from the experience, providing new insights into literature, new methods for encouraging pupil engagement, and renewed enthusiasm for promoting reading for pleasure.

settings.title: Body Safety Wise
settings.description:
The Body Safety Wise presentation is a PK-8 curriculum that teaches students about body safety, consent, and boundaries. It includes an engaging introduction, a book reading, giveaways, book signing, and a brief Q&A.

Benefits

Promote and raise awareness about the importance of body safety education and literacy in your community through social media, school events, and other platforms.

Agree to at least one interview, or photoshoot, promoting body safety education and literacy.

Submit any feedback you have received from your community, report on your activities as an ambassador, including any events or activities you have hosted, any social media posts you have made, and any feedback you have received from your community.

settings.title: General Assembly
settings.description:
